Title: Relates to the application of the sanitary code to all farm and food processing labor camps for migrant workers
Summary: Extends the application of the sanitary code to all farm and food processing labor camps for migrant workers from January 1, 2021 to January 1, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 105 of the laws of 2019 amending the public health law and other laws relating to the application of the sanitary code to all farm and food processing labor camps for migrant workers, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
